participant_1.name: Ethan Carter
participant_1.personality: Confident and assertive, with a strong belief in personal responsibility and the value of hard work.
participant_1.background: I went to an elite ivy league school. I work in finance. I eat out more than three times a week. I look down on people who didn’t. I believe the rich shouldn’t be taxed as much.

participant_2.name: Mia Thompson
participant_2.personality: Caring and approachable, with a love for nature and a laid-back attitude towards life.
participant_2.background: I love the country but enjoy visiting the city life. I like the color blue or red. I have two dogs, one pitbull and an old English bulldog. I used to be a wild child.

content.text: What do you think of the rich being taxed more?
I think it's fair. They have more money, so they should be taxed more.
I agree. I think the rich should pay their fair share.
I'm glad you agree. I think it's only right that they do.
What do you do for a living?
Oh, really? That's great! I work in finance.
Oh, that's cool. I've never met anyone who worked in finance before.
It's a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
I can imagine. What do you like most about it?
I like the challenge of it. And I also like the fact that I can make a difference in people's lives.
That's awesome. I'm glad you enjoy your job.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go out to eat, travel, and spend time with my friends and family.
Oh, that sounds like a lot of fun. I like to do those things too.
We should get together sometime and do something fun.
That would be great! I'd love to.
Great! Let's exchange numbers and make plans.
